name: XRInputSource.handedness
description: The read-only XRInputSource property handedness indicates which of the user's hands the WebXR input source is associated with, or if it's not associated with a hand at all.
content:
Secure context
This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.

The read-onlyXRInputSource property handednessindicates which of the user's hands the WebXR input source is associated with, or if it's not associated with a hand at all.
